title: Quarkus 2.7.1.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.7.1.Final, our first maintenance release for our 2.7 release train. It contains bugfixes and documentation improvements, but also a couple of new features, filling a few gaps. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.7. If you are not using 2.7 already, please refer...
